title: How To Introduce A New Hen To The Hen House

tasks.task: Introduce a new hen to the hen house
subtasks: Position the crate in the chicken run near the hen house
Allow the chickens to observe the new hen without direct access for 3 days
Open the crate door when the chickens have lost interest

tasks.task: Safeguard a chicken while acclimating it to the flock
subtasks: Use a dog crate or fence to separate the chicken from the flock
Gradually reduce separation as the chicken becomes accustomed to the flock
Calculate daily water intake based on body weight in ounces
Monitor and maintain adequate water consumption
